Amalya, 22 years old, lives on her own in Sevan. She is a programmer but since she couldn’t find a job in Sevan, she decided to run her own business. Amalya is asking for a 150,000 AMD loan in order to buy beautiful landscape pictures, which she will sell in her large shop.

loans.use: To buy beautiful landscape pictures to resell

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie, 37, has three children and lives in Manila, Philippines. She is married to Edwin, an employee. Melanie and her husband manage their own household while operating the business. Melanie works hard to continually provide income for the family's everyday expenses.

Melanie retails processed meat products, such as ham, hot dogs, processed pork, etc. She buys the products from the wholesaler and then sells them per piece/pack for a profit. Customers are attracted to the low prices and the many options Melanie offers. She also retails cellphone loads for additional income. Melanie's regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Melanie is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan, which she will use to buy more quantities and varieties of processed meat products to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Melanie hopes to be able to expand soon, as she dreams of being able to give her children a good, high quality education through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stock of processed meat products

loans.name: Ismaiil

texts.en:
Ismaiil is a 40-year-old married father of four children. Twelve years ago, he opened a grocery store, which is his family's main source of income. Ismaiil is a hard worker; he puts a lot of effort into improving his business to reflect positively on his family's social and financial situation and to ensure that he provides his children with the best education ever.

To improve his living conditions, Ismaiil has opened another business, a grain shop specializing in selling almost all kinds of grains. This business is highly requested in his area and recommended by most of his customers. Ismaiil is requesting a loan for the first time from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to support his newly started business, with special items and goods with special prices to ensure customer satisfaction and recommendations. He hopes to keep on improving his income to keep his family living happily.

loans.use: To buy special items and goods to support his newly started business

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 48-year-old married father of three children. He has owned a bookstore for 31 years and his business is still going on just fine, almost covering most of his family's needs. Mohamad is a hard worker and is well known in his region, with his good reputation.

Mohamad has already had two loan cycles with Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua. His previous loan was invested in improving his business, and today Mohamad is applying for a new loan in order to increase his merchandise with special children's items for the spring and summer seasons. He will stock items such as coloring books, sea inflatables, games and many other entertaining items that will bring joy to the children during their Easter and summer vacations. This will also increase Mohamad's income and help in buying another car to replace the one that was stolen from him.

loans.use: To increase his merchandise with special children's items for the spring and summer seasons

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia, 28 years old, is from Iraq. She is a youth client who is married and has two children.

Nadia has been a tailor since 2006; she makes, repairs and alters clothing, such as suits, coats and dresses, for women. She has more than six years experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers and their needs. Nadia has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

Nadia decided to apply for a loan of $1,100 in order to purchase a tailoring machine and more goods. She is aiming to gain more profits to improve her family’s life.

loans.use: to purchase a tailoring machine and more goods.

loans.name: Dama

texts.en:
Dama is married and has 4 children, 3 of them enrolled in school. Her husband, Ngata, is a farmer. Dama operates a farming business and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for over 15 years and was previously employed as a cereals seller. Her primary customers are villagers. Dama describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality, Dama will use this KES 20,000 loan to buy cereals and sell them when the price hikes. Dama aspires to buy and sell cereals at wholesale in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds.	

Dama's highest monthly expenses are food and fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

loans.use: to purchase cereals for resale.

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yanira del Carmen de 39 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica al negocio de peluquería que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado establecer y mantener en marcha por mucho tiempo. Cuenta con muy buenas referencia y gracias a su arduo trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada vez la prefieren más, por ser una mujer, trabajadora, luchadora y sobre todo carismática. Su sueño es poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida en especial a sus queridos hijos que por el momento se encuentran estudiando. No pierde las esperanzas de poder darles el estudio y lograr verlos como grandes profesionales ya que es la única forma de poder brindar estabilidad y mejores condiciones de vida. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a  INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeña peluquería en la compra de espejos e  invertir en la reparación de los sillones que por el uso están deteriorados. Su objetivo es mejorar el servicio a los clientes para que estos se sientan motivados a querer regresar en el futuro y puedan invitar a otros clientes,  de tal forma que esto sirva para mejorar los  ingresos que le permitan accesar  a mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
Yanira del Carmen, 39, lives with her two children in a house that’s her property.  Her business is a barber shop which with much effort and dedication she’s managed to establish and keep operating for a long time.  She has very good references and thanks to her hard work has won over the trust of many people who prefer her more each day because she’s a hardworking, tenacious and above all, charismatic woman.  

Her dream is to be able to give her family better living conditions especially to her beloved children who are currently attending school.  She does not lose hope of being able to provide schooling for them and to see them become great professionals since this is the only way of offering them stability and better living conditions.

She has decided to ask Integral for this loan to invest in her small barber shop.  She will buy mirrors and invest in chair repair because they are in poor condition.  Her goal is to improve customer service so that they will feel motivated to want to return in the future and they can invite other customers so that her income will improve in order to access better economic conditions.

loans.use: to buy mirrors and to invest in chair repair.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es: Mario Alberto de 50 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa y sus dos hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos tales como maíz y frijoles. De esta forma se gana la vida y es como logra llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Es su principal fuente ingresos, dado que una vez saca la cosecha del año, la vende para poder sacar los ingresos que le permitan cubrir las principales  necesarias del hogar. Para él es muy importante su familia. Lo que más desea es poder ayudarle a salir adelante,  principalmente a sus hijos que son su principal inspiración. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de fertilizantes y fungicidas para su cultivo, todo esto con el fin de obtener una buena cosecha que le permita mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Alberto, 50, lives in a house of his own with his family which is composed of his wife and two children.  He farms basic grains like corn and beans.  This is how he earns his livelihood and how he manages to provide daily bread for his home.  It’s his main source of income since once he gathers the yearly harvest he sells it to earn income to cover the home’s main expenses.  For him, his family is very important.  What he wants most is to help them get ahead, especially his children who are his greatest inspiration.

He’s decided to ask Integral for a loan to buy fertilizer and fungicide for his crops so that he can get a good harvest that will make it possible for him to improve his income and consequently his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Afepeb Group

texts.fr: Le groupement AFEPEB est composé de douze personnes qui mènent toutes des activités génératrices de revenus et habitent le même village. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Bérengère Germaine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bérengère Germaine est âgée de 54 ans et n'est pas encore mariée. Bérengère Germaine n'a pas non plus d'enfant. Bérengère Germaine assure donc seule ses différentes charges. Pour y parvenir, Bérengère Germaine mène comme activité, la vente de chaussures, de tissus et de sacs à son domicile. Bérengère Germaine exerce cette activité depuis trois ans et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Bérengère Germaine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement AFEPEB, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group AFEPEB comprises twelve persons who all have revenue-generating businesses and who live in the same village. This is the second time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their businesses. 

The group's representative, Bérengère Germaine, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 54 years old and is not yet married. Neither does she have any children. So she supports herself alone. To do so, she has a business selling shoes, cloth, and handbags out of her home. She has been in this business for three years and gets her supplies from Lomé, the capital of Togo. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Bérengère Germaine, along with the other members of the group AFEPEB, is requesting a second loan from ALIDé

loans.use: to buy shoes, handbags, and cloth

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos especialmente maíz y frijoles. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área. Sus vecinos dan buenas referencias de él puesto que con su amabilidad, honestidad y trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de  muchas personas. Para él lo más importante es que su familia cuente con lo necesario para sobrevivir.  El señor Mariano no se cansa de trabajar, para él su familia es su principal inspiración y es por ella que día  a día se levanta muy temprano para poder cultivar la tierra y poder cosechar los granos básicos que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir  en los insumos necesarios (semilla, venenos para plagas, abonos, etc.) para él cultivo de los granos básicos que año con año cosecha. Espera y confía en Dios que logrará  resultados favorables que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Mariano lives in a house that’s his with his family.  He farms basic grains, especially corn and beans.  He’s been in this line of work for a long time so he has much experience in this field.  His neighbors give him good references because he’s managed to win over the trust of many with his kindness, honesty and work.  For him, what is most important is that his family has everything necessary to survive.  

Mariano does not tire of working.  For him, his family is his main inspiration and it’s for them that he rises early every day to be able to farm the land and harvest basic grains that are his main source of income.

He’s decided to ask Integral for this loan to buy necessary supplies (seeds, bug killers, manure, etc.) for his basic grain crops that he harvests year by year.  He hopes and trusts in God that he’ll obtain favorable results that will allow him to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, bug killers, manure, etc.

loans.name: Luz De María

texts.es: Luz de María de 49 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos. Ella se dedica a la comercialización de productos herbalife los cuales son productos nutricionales y de cuidado personal. Tiene 9 años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área y con varios clientes fijos. Con mucho trabajo y dedicación  se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas las cuales cada día la prefieren más por ser una mujer emprendedora, responsable y carismática. Ella ofrece variedad de productos nutricionales como vitaminas, suplementos alimenticios, etc. a muy buenos precios.  Ella trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su querida familia. La situación económica es muy inestable y las preocupaciones de Luz aumentan muy rápido dado que las exigencias de su familia cada vez son mayores. Debido a lo anterior a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la comprar de productos nutricionales como son: vitaminas y suplementos alimenticios, entre otros. De tal forma que esto ayude a atraer a más clientes que generen un aumento en las ventas y en los ingresos que permitan mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en:
Luz de María, 49, lives in a house that’s hers with her family composed of her husband and three children.  She sells Herbalife products which are nutritional and personal care products. She’s been in this line of work for 9 years so she has much experience in this occupation and several regular customers.  With much work and dedication she’s won over the trust of many people who prefer her day by day for being an enterprising, responsible and charismatic woman.

She sells a variety of nutritional products like vitamins, nutritional supplements, etc. at very good prices.  She works hard to support her beloved family.  The economic situation is very unstable and Luz’s worries increase very rapidly because her family’s needs are greater every day.

Because of the above, Luz has decided to ask Integral for a loan to invest in her business buying nutritional products like vitamins and nutritional supplements among others so that she can attract more customers that will generate sales and income increases  that will allow her to improve her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, nutritional supplements, etc.

loans.name: Gbenonkpo 145 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBENONKPO 145 est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Safouratou est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Safouratou est âgée de 43 ans et vit au Bénin. Safouratou n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Safouratou est mariée à un certain Pascal. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Safouratou vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure ensemble avec lui les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer ses diverses charges, Safouratou vend du maïs et du tissus dans une région du Bénin. Safouratou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Safouratou sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO 145, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The GBENONKPO 145 group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The is the fourth time that this group has asked ALIDé for financial help, in order to increase their level of activity. The group's representative, Safouratou, has her hand raised in the photo. Safouratou is 43 years old and lives in Benin. She did not go to school. She is married to a man named Pascal. The couple has four children, all of whom go to school and are in their care. Safouratou lives with her husband and children. She and her husband are both responsible for meeting the household's various expenses. 

In order to meet her expenses, Safouratou sells corn and fabric in a region of Benin. She obtains her supplies in a market in Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and increase turnover and revenue, Safouratou and the other GBENONKPO 145 members are asking ALIDé for a fourth loan. The previous loans have all been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabric and sacks of corn.

loans.name: Blanca Yaneth

texts.es: Blanca Yaneth habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo él cual se dedica a la agricultura. Ella se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir.  El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Blanca es una mujer increíble y muy ejemplar  ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y positiva, además, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Elabora variedad de prendas de vestir  a precios muy accesibles. También ofrece calidad en su trabajo, razón por la cual muchas personas la prefieren. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y sobre todo con clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para  invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios (telas, hilos, elástico, etc.) para la elaboración de variedad de prendas de vestir. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a los clientes de tal forma que los clientes se sientan motivados a seguir solicitando sus servicios y así sus ventas e ingresos se vean incrementados. Espera lograr su objetivo y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca Yaneth lives in a house that’s hers with her husband who is a farmer.  She makes articles of clothing to sell.  The business is located in her house.  Blanca is an incredible, very exemplary woman who is very hardworking, responsible and positive.  Besides, many people give her good personal and work references. 

She makes a variety of clothing items at very accessible prices.  She also offers quality in her work which is why many people prefer her.  She’s been in this line of work for many years so has quite a bit of experience in it and above all regular customers who prefer her more each day.

She’s decided to ask Integral for this loan to invest in her small business buying necessary supplies (fabric, thread, elastic, etc.) to make a variety of articles of clothing.  She does all this aiming at providing better customers service so that her customers will feel motivated to continue requesting her service and her sales and income will increase.  She hopes to reach her objective and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: María Griselda

texts.es: María Griselda habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus tres hijos que se encuentran estudiando.  Ella es una mujer ejemplar la cual trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su querida familia. Hace muchos años y gracias a muchos esfuerzos ha logrado establecer una  pequeña tienda en la cual ofrece todo tipo de producto de primera necesidad como: granos básicos, detergente, golosinas, pan dulce, etc.  María  es una mujer emprendedora y gracias a su creatividad  ha logrado mantener activo su negocio. Ella no se rinde,  quiere mejorar su servicio y hacer que su negocio crezca cada día más. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para cumplir su sueño y mejorar el servicio que ofrece y al mismo tiempo mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia. Con el crédito espera comprar variedad de artículos de tienda como: arroz, maíz, frijoles, azúcar, pan dulce, golosinas, etc. Confía en Dios que los resultados serán favorables.
texts.en:
María Griselda lives in her own house with her three children who are attending school.  She’s an exemplary woman who works hard to support her beloved family.  Many years ago and thanks to much effort she was able to open a small store where she offers all types of basic staple items like: basic grains, detergent, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

María is an enterprising woman and thanks to her creativity has managed to maintain her business active.  She does not give up and wants to improve service and make her business grow more every day.

Because of this she’s decided to ask Integral for a loan to reach her dream and improve service while at the same time improving her and her family’s living condition. 

She expects to use the loan to buy a variety of goods like: rice, beans, corn, sugar, sweet bread, snacks, etc.  She trusts in God that results will be favorable.

loans.use: to buy rice, corn, beans, sugar, sweet bread, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Salem De Ouanaminthe Group

texts.fr:
Micheline est la coordonatrice de son groupe SALEM DE OUANAMINTHE, la ville de OUANAMINTHE d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle est  mariée elle a des enfants. Micheline a dirigé son business pendant les 10 dernières années avant de commencer ce commerce, Elle  etait a l’ecole.

Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l’achat des vetements uses. Micheline espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Les  autres membres Salem ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre du charbon, du riz et des vetements uses.

Micheline dit que son défi principal est manque d’acheteur constant dit que ses buts principaux sont l’augmentation du business. Son rêve est l’achat d’un camion pour transporter les marchandises.
texts.en:
Micheline is the coordinator of her group SALEM DE OUANAMINTHE, the city of OUANAMINTHE, in Haiti where electricity is rare and water is in short supply. Micheline is married and has children. She has run a business for the last ten years before starting this business. She has been to school. 

Micheline would like to use this loan to invest in the purchase of used clothing. She hopes that this loan will help her to expand her business. The other members of SALEM have need of a loan for such businesses as selling charcoal, rice, and used clothing. 

Micheline says that her main challenge is a lack of constant customers and that her main goals include growing her business. Her dream is to buy a truck to transport merchandise.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: Doña Felipa es una clienta con 43 años de edad, casada y con tres hijos. Vive con su esposo y una hija. Humilde y muy trabajadora. Tiene trayectoria en la Fundación y siempre se ha caracterizado por su puntualidad y responsabilidad. Ella se dedica al comercio ambulante de oro, perfumes finos y cortinas. Además tiene un salón de belleza en donde presta los servicios de químicos para el cabello y estética. Sus clientes son vecinos, familiares y trabajadores de diferentes bananeras aledañas a su comunidad. Ella se organiza días específicos para salir a vender su mercadería y poder atender también a sus clientas del salón. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y una hija para el cobro de su mercadería. Ha tenido dificultad en su negocio por la falta de capital para poder ofrecer mayor variedad y ahora lo supera por el financiamiento que se le otorga.
texts.en:
Felipa, 43, is married and has three children.  She lives with her husband and a daughter.  She is humble and very hardworking.  She has history with the Fundación and has always been noted for her punctuality and responsibility.  

She is an ambulatory gold, fine perfume and curtains merchant.  She also has a beauty salon where she provides chemical hair treatments and beauty services.  Her customers are neighbors, family members and laborers from nearby banana plantations. 

She organizes specific days to go out selling her merchandise while also being able to tend to her salon customers.  Her husband and daughter help her collect payment for her merchandise.  She’s had some difficulty in the business because of lack of capital to be able to offer a wider selection but she hopes the loan she will get now will help her overcome this.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like gold and others.

loans.name: Betty Edme

texts.es:
Betty es una mujer que tiene un pequeño de 14 años, por el que siempre lucha y está a dispuesta a dar algo más de sí con la finalidad de cuidarlo y apoyarlo en todo lo que necesite. Ella es una mujer que culminando el colegio deseó poder inscribirse y estudiar para convertirse en secretaria, pero debido a muchos motivos ella, ni su familia tuvieron la capacidad económica para cumplirle este deseo y necesidad académica. Es así como esta historia de lucha empieza, una mujer que decidida y dispuesta a dar lo mejor de sí, empezó a iniciarse en el comercio.

Betty se dedica a realizar la venta de pan, en una avenida muy concurrida de la ciudad de Ica. Ella se levanta muy temprano diariamente para así poder comprar todo el pan que venderá en la mañana, Betty trabaja un promedio de 6 horas. Ella ya tiene muchos años en este negocio y con el tiempo ha logrado hacerse conocida en la zona en donde vive. Decidió tomar esta decisión y convertirse en una gran microempresaria, meta que actualmente viene cumpliendo.

Después de tanto tiempo, ella ha detectado que algunos de sus clientes tienen la necesidad de desayunar en el mismo lugar, es por ello que ha decidido realizar la compra de sillas y mesas con la finalidad de vender desayunos y así incrementar la cantidad de sus clientes y por ende sus ingresos. Es por este motivo que ha recurrido al apoyo de los prestatarios Kiva, ya que actualmente no tiene el dinero suficiente para realizar la compra de todos estos accesorios.
texts.en:
Betty is a woman who has a 14-year-old son she strives for always and is willing to give all she has in order to care for him and support him in everything he needs.  She’s a woman who upon completing secondary school wanted to be able to enroll to study and become a secretary but due to many reasons neither she nor her family had the economic wherewithal to make this dream and academic need come true.  This is how this history of struggle starts, a woman who is determined and willing to give her best begins to start off in commerce.

Betty decides to go into bread sales on a very busy avenue in the city of Ica.  She rises very early every day to be able to buy all the bread she’ll sell in the morning.  Betty works on average 6 hours.  She has been in this business many years and in time has managed to become well-known in the zone where she lives.  She decided to make this choice and become a great micro businesswoman, a goal she’s currently reaching.

After all this time, she’s detected that some of her customers would like to have breakfast in the same place so she’s decided to buy some tables and chairs with the goal of selling breakfasts to increase the number of her customers and thus her income.  This is why she’s calling on support from Kiva lenders because she does not have sufficient money to buy all these accessories at present.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for her new business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Edgar David

texts.es:
Edgar es un hombre soltero que tiene todos los ánimos de salir adelante y progresar continuamente para así lograr convertirse en un gran microempresa. Actualmente vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar que con el transcurso del tiempo ha mejorado económicamente y le da la bienvenida a los nuevos microempresarios.

Edgar es un joven que se dedica a realizar el servicio de decorado para eventos, el se está haciendo muy conocido en la zona por donde vive y también lo están recomendando para otros distritos de la ciudad de Ica, debido a lo satisfechos que quedan sus clientes.

Él trabaja aproximadamente 12 horas a la semana donde tiene que pensar los colores que combinará, el diseño de la decoración, entre otros  factores. Es gracias a sus padres que él se animo a convertirse en un gran decorador. Edgar también trabaja en una empresa de transporte como ayudante, lo que le permite tener ingresos mientras no se dedica a la decoración.

Edgar desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan apoyarlo para poder alquilar un pequeño local donde guardar todos sus implementos de decoración, debido a que actualmente se encuentran en su casa y ocupan demasiado espacio. Con esta ayuda podrá consolidar su negocio, mejorar sus ingresos y desde luego lograr el sueño de la casa propia.
texts.en:
Edgar is a single man who is very motivated to get ahead and make constant progress in order to become a great micro business.  He currently lives in the city of Ica, a place that has improved economically with the passage of time and that welcomes new micro businessmen.

Edgar is a young man who provides event decoration services.  He’s becoming very well known in the area where he lives and he’s also being recommended in other districts in Ica by his satisfied customers.

He works approximately 12 hours per week thinking about the colors he’ll have to combine, the design of the decoration among other factors.  Thanks to his parents he ventured forth to become a great decorator.  Edgar also works for a transportation firm as an assistant which allows him to earn income while he’s not doing decorations.

Edgar hopes that Kiva lenders will be able to support his so that he can rent a small locale where he can store all his decoration supplies because they are currently at home and they take up too much space.  With this help he will be able to consolidate the business, improve his income and, of course, reach his dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to rent a small locale to store his materials.

loans.name: Tuzamure Rubanda Rugufi Group

texts.fr:
Alodie fait partie du groupe Tuzamurane Rubanda Rugufi. Elle a 38 ans, elle est marie avec 1 enfants de 17 dont 1 scolarises. Elle a 1 personne dans son charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans de secondaire.

Alodie est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de solliciter d’autre crédit pour renforcer son agriculture. Dans les prochaines années, Alodie voudrait devenir une meilleure dans son  agricultrice. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de scolariser et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Alodie is part of the group Tuzamurane Rubanda Rugufi. She is 38 years old. She is married and has one child, aged 17, who is in school. She has one person aside from her own child to support. She has three years of middle school education.
 
Alodie is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is her first one with the microfinance institution ACB. She is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor. 

Her strategy for the growth of her business is to request another loan for bolstering her farming. In the next few years, she would like to be one of the best in rice farming. With the profit, she plans on providing schooling for the children and taking care of them.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Aurelia Feliciana

texts.es:
Aurelia tiene 64 años de edad, pero se considera una joven de 20 años porque es muy entusiasta y sobre todo carismática, vive junto a su esposo y su hija a la que quiere mucho, aun mas porque ya es abuela de una preciosa nieta, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad conocida por ser la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, así como también porque ahí se encuentra la mayor parte de la descendencia afroperuana; asimismo es la ciudad donde se preparan platillos muy ricos, gracias a que sus pobladores tienen un don para la cocina. Aurelia disfruta de su tiempo libre paseando con su nieta, la cual es su adoración, asimismo gracias a su habilidad para la cocina le gusta preparar uno de sus platilos favoritos el cual es “Arroz con pato y Carapulcra”; ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar medicina.

Todos los días Aurelia sale a trabajar en su negocio de venta de hamburguesas y salchipollo, trabaja alrededor de 6 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 60 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda una buena atención a sus clientes y atiende hasta tarde lo que le permite tener un poco mas de clientes asi como también tiene buena sazón para la preparación de sus productos.

Aurelia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar, mas ingredientes para la elaboración de sus productos al por mayor , en especial ingredientes como papa, carne, pollo, pan, embutidos entre otros, ya que le ayudara a ahorrar un poco más en los ingredientes y mejorar sus ingresos, asi seguirá trabajando día a día para comprarse un carrito sanguchero nuevo y luchar para realizar su gran sueño:”  Construir su casa ya que esta se derrumbo cuando ocurrió el terremoto del año 2007 y sobre todo apoyar a su nieta con sus estudios”.
texts.en:
Aurelia is 64 years old but she thinks of herself as a young 20-year-old because she’s very enthusiastic and above all charismatic.  She lives with her husband and daughter who she loves very much all the more so because she’s now a grandmother of a beautiful granddaughter.  

Her house is located in the city of Chincha, a city known for being the birthplace of great Peruvian sports heroes as well as because most of the Afro-Peruvian descendents are here.  It’s also a city where delicious meals are prepared thanks to the residents having a gift for cooking.  Aurelia enjoys her free time very much taking her granddaughter for walks; she is her adoration.  Also, thanks to her cooking ability she likes to make one of her favorite dishes which is ‘Arroz con Pato y Carapulcra.” She only went to secondary school but would have liked to study medicine.

Every day Aurelia goes out to work selling hamburgers and “salchipollo” [fried potatoes with fried chicken].  She works about 6 hours per day and can see up to 60 customers per day.  She believes that she does well in her business because she provides good customer service and is open late which allows her to have a few more customers and also because she prepares her dishes in a very tasty way.

Aurelia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to buy more ingredients at wholesale to prepare per products, especially ingredients like potatoes, meat, chicken, bread and cured meats, among others since it will help her save a bit more on the ingredients and improve her income so that she can continue working every day in order to buy a new food cart and strive to reach her great dream: “To build a house since her current one crumbled in the 2007 earthquake and above all to support her granddaughter’s schooling.”

loans.use: to buy ingredients at wholesale.

loans.name: Razzak

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 65 years old, and married with four children, one of whom works. 

Razzak has owned a food market since 2008, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fish, and dairy products. He has  experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $1,700 in order to buy a showcase and add more foodstuffs. He is aiming to earn more profits to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: In order to buy a showcase and add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en: Mariam is a married woman. She has six children, four of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Yunus; he is a businessman. Mariam operates a kiosk (retail shop) and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for four years and was previously employed as a farmer. Her primary customers are villagers. She describes her greatest business challenge as delayed payments by customers; her highest monthly expenses are food and fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mariam will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar to sell. Mariam aspires to open a bigger shop in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: Dolores de 51 años de edad, habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo de 46 años de edad y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de panadería de forma ambulante en especial de paletas de galleta que día a día prepara para salir a vender en las principales áreas de la zona donde habita. Tiene más de 10 años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia.  Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, dedicada y sobre todo responsable.  Muchas personas la prefieren puesto que siempre comercializa variedad de galletas a muy buenos precios. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de la materia prima (harina, azúcar, huecos, colorantes, paletas, etc.) para continuar elaborando las ricas galletas. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita aumentar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Dolores, who is 51 years old, lives with her family group, which consists of her husband, who is 46 years old, and their two children. She works in the baking business as an itinerant vendor. Her specialty is cookie pops, which she prepares every day to go out and sell in the principal areas of the zone where she lives. She has been working in this business for 10 years, so she has a lot of experience. She is characterized by being a woman who is entrepreneurial, dedicated, and above all responsible. Many people give her their business since she always sells a variety of cookies at very good prices.

She decided to apply for this loan at Integral to invest in the purchase of basic ingredients (flour, sugar, eggs, food coloring, popsicle sticks, etc.) to continue making the delicious cookies. She does all this with the goal of meeting a greater demand which allows her to increase her level of sales and income and thus be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, food coloring, popsicle sticks, etc.

loans.name: Jaqueline Del Carmen

texts.es: La  señora Jaqueline está muy contenta, por el apoyo  que le  brinda kiva  ya que su pequeño negocio  ha incrementado su inventario y sus ventas gracias a los financiamientos obtenidos , ya que ahora no solo ofrece a su clientes lo que es granos básicos , si no también lo que corresponde al complemento alimenticio como es pollo , carne , lácteos , etc. Doña Jaqueline tiene el gran sueño de poder construir su vivienda y espera que en un futuro que su pulpería se pueda suplir por sí sola , le apoyemos para construir su humilde vivienda , ya que es una mujer con muchas ganas de superarse y darle lo mejor a su familia .
texts.en: Jaqueline is very happy for the support that Kiva gives her. Her small business has increased its inventory and sales thanks to the loans she has received. Now she not only offers her customers basic grains, but also other foods such as chicken, meat, dairy, etc. Jacqueline dreams of being able to build a home and hopes that in the future she can supply her store products without any assistance.  Her Kiva Field Partners support her because she is a woman who is eager to succeed and give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries, candy, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida de 27 años y sus dos hijos de 13 y 15 años de edad. Junto con su esposo han logrado establecer un taller de estructura metálica el cual atienden entre los dos para dar un mejor servicio a los clientes. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos se encuentren en las mejores condiciones. Esa es la razón por la cual no se cansa de trabajar y sigue luchando para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. El negocio se encuentra ubicado en su hogar de habitación y tienen ya varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Tienen algunos clientes fijos que los prefieren porque siempre prestan el mejor servicio a los mejores precios. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora y sobre todo responsable la cual ha sabido  llevar la responsabilidad del hogar y del negocio. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en el taller de estructura metálica en la compra de herramientas y hierro que le permita prestar un mejor servicio a los clientes cuando lo soliciten. Tiene mucha confianza que logrará resultados favorables y podrá dar a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria lives in her own house along with her life companion of 27 years and their two children, ages 13 and 15. She and her husband have succeeded in establishing a workshop for metal structures, which they tend between them in order to give better service to the customers. For her, the most important thing is that her children have the best conditions. This is the reason why she doesn't rest from working and continues striving to bring home the daily bread. The business is located in their home, and they have already worked in this business for a number of years. They have a number of regular customers who prefer them because they always give the best service at the best prices. 

She is a very hard-working woman who is entrepreneurial and, above all, responsible, and she has been able to take responsibility for the house and for the business. She decided to apply to Integral for this loan to invest in the metal workshop by buying tools and iron, which will allow her to give better service to her customers when they have requests. She has great confidence that she will have favorable results and will be able to give her family better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy tools and iron

loans.name: Erick Cristopher

texts.es:
Erick es un joven de 28 años de edad que disfruta mucho de jugar al futbol con sus amigos en sus tiempos libres, ya que lo considera una actividad de relajación después de permanecer sentado durante toda la mañana en su vehículo. Actualmente este joven vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar en  el que se puede realizar un recorrido en las enormes y desérticas dunas a través de los famosísimos tubulares, en esta ciudad.

Erick trabaja un promedio de 10 horas diarias, tiempo en el que se dirige a distintos destinos dentro del distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú lugar en el que  desempeña su labor. El nos comenta que esta actividad le está permitiendo progresar poco a poco y está muy contento con los ingresos que viene recibiendo.

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Erick logrará comprar una moto taxi, ya que actualmente trabaja en una moto alquilada, con este apoyo tendrá un ingresos adicional ya que no deberá incurrir en gastos de alquiler. Así sabe que mejorará sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ganancias y así disfrutar del sueño de la casa propia.
texts.en:
Erick, 28, enjoys playing soccer with his friends in his free time as he considers it to be a relaxing activity after spending the day sitting in his vehicle. This young man is currently living in the city of Ica, a place where one can tour the enormous sand dunes on the famous tubular dune buggies.

Erick works an average of 10 hours a day, time that brings him to different destinations throughout the district of Parcona, Ica, Perú, the place where he is employed. His work is allowing him to progress bit by bit and he is very happy with the income he has received.

With the help of Kiva, Erick will buy a motor taxi, as he is currently working with a rented one. With this support he will earn additional income as he will no longer incur rental costs. Knowing that he will increase his income and profits will allow him to enjoy the dream of owning his own home.

loans.use: to buy a motor taxi.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a married woman with 7 children, 5 of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Mwandeje, and he works as a businessman. Saumu operates a business selling goat meat and also farms, earning her another source of livelihood. She has worked in this business for over 15 years and previously operated a small retail shop. Her primary customers are her community and butcher shop operators. 

She describes her greatest business challenge as transportation and her highest monthly expenses as food and fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Saumu will use a loan of 25,000 KES to buy more goats to sell for meat. Saumu aspires to expand her business and open a slaughter house in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more goats to sell for meat.

loans.name: Adi

texts.es:
Adi es una joven muy trabajadora y entusiasta, vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú; el distrito de Parcona es conocido por uno de sus atractivos turísticos el cual es el bosque de piedras, así como también la amabilidad de sus pobladores. Adi es fanática de la comida típica de nuestro país, por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo, sobre todo si lleva papa a la huancaína mejor; en su tiempo libre disfruta de bailar porque eso la alegra y la relaja. Debido a los pocos recursos de sus padres ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Enfermería.

Con mucho empeño Adi trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa y de productos de belleza, es muy carismática y se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 4 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 5 clientes al día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de calidad y a precios accesibles.

Adi esta agradecida por la ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a ese apoyo ella podrá comprar mercadería en especial ropa y útiles escolares (cuadernos, hojas, lapiceros, folders, entre otros), lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir trabajando día a día para lograr realizar su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Adi is a hardworking and enthusiastic young woman, she lives in the district of Parcona, Ica, Peru; the district of Parcona is known for one of its tourist attractions which is the stones forest, it's also know for the kindness of its people.  Adi loves traditional food from her country, one of her favorite dishes is rice with chicken, specially if it has potato prepared huancaina style as a side dish; during her free time she enjoys dancing because that makes her happy and helps her relax.  Due to the limited resources her parents had she only had secondary studies, but she would have liked to study to be a nurse.

With hard work Adi has a business selling clothes and beauty products, she is charismatic and works on her business approximately 4 hours daily and can service up to 5 customers, she thinks she is doing well in her business because she offers good quality products at affordable prices.

Adi is thankful for the help provided by the Kiva lenders and with this support she will be able to buy merchandise particularly clothing and school supplies (notebooks, paper, pens, folders and others) this will allow her to increase her income and continue to work day to day to reach her dream: To have her own house.

loans.use: to buy clothing and school supplies

loans.name: Ludis Antonio

texts.es: El señor Ludis, es un humilde agricultor de la zona de Masaya, habita junto a su familia , los planes hacia un futuro es poder apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios , don Ludís desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de yuca , la mayor afectación que se le presento fueron los grandes chubascos de agua que terminaron con el cultivo , quedándose sin nada de la plantación , pero gracias al apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de los fondo kiva , logro establecer un cuarto de manzana de pipianes y con eso logro pagar su préstamo y salir adelante con su trabajos agrícola , ya que su familia se sustenta con las venta de este producto. Ahora necesita comprar madera de yuca para volver a plantar el cultivo, así también como fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para combatir cualquier plaga que se vaya a presentar  y también cosechara en  un  futuro pipianes y ayotes ya que estos dos rubros se clasifican por  ser muy fructuosos en tiempo de invierno.
texts.en: Ludis is an unassuming farmer from the Masaya area, where he lives with his family.  His plans for the future include supporting his children in their education.  For a number of years, Ludis has been cultivating cassava.  He's been affected the most by heavy downpours that destroyed his crops, literally leaving nothing left of his cultivations.  But thanks to the support that Afodenic has provided him, through Kiva, he managed to put in a quarter of a manzana  (about half an acre) of squash.  In this way he managed to pay off his loan and continue working as a farmer, because he supports his family with the sale of his crops.  Now he needs to buy cassava stalks so that he can go back to growing this crop.  He will also buy fertilizers and other supplies that he needs to control any pests that appear.  In the future, he will also harvest two varieties of squash, because these varieties tend to grow very well during the winter season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
This is Janet, 39, a resident of Manila, Philippines. Her husband is Rolando, a welder. Janet is a mother to her three children. She, together with her husband, manages the household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Janet operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 1000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Janet hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams to be able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Fadel

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married and has three children.

Fadel has been a tailor since 2010. He owns a workshop where he makes, repairs, or alters clothing, professionally, as suits, coats for men. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and he knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

Fadel is requesting a $2400 loan in order to pay the annual rent for his workshop. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his workshop.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 30 years old and married. She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Loida has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and farm supplies.

Loida has been farming vegetables for 9 years now, and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Loida would like to save enough to buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farm supplies.

loans.name: Fakhriya

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 58 years old and married. She has four children, three of whom work.

Fakhriya has been a tailor since 1990. She makes, repairs, or alters clothing professionally into suits, coats and dresses for women. She has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is well known in the surrounding areas.

She decided to apply for $2400 loan in order to purchase a tailoring machine and an electrical generator. She is aiming to gain more profits to improve her family’s life as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase a tailoring machine and an electrical generator.

loans.name: José Reynaldo

texts.es: El señor Reynaldo, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa , los planes hacia su familia es seguir mejorando su humilde vivienda , gracias a los financiamientos anteriores ha logrado mejorar las paredes y el piso del hogar , pero ahora se le presenta una gran situación en el techo de la vivienda ya que está muy deteriorado y en tiempos de lluvia se les pasa el agua y no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para iniciar el cambio de techo , agradece la confianza y el apoyo que le brinda kiva atravez de Afodenic , ya que son muchas las familias de escasos recursos que con su ayuda logran cambiar su calidad de vida .El prestamo lo quiere para comprar zinc
texts.en: Mr. Reynaldo lives in the Ticuantepe municipality with his wife. He hopes to keep improving his families' humble home and thanks to the previous loans he has been able to improve the walls and the floor. Now they need to fix the roof since it is deteriorated and when it rains it floods and Mr. Reynaldo doesn’t have the necessary money to start fixing the roof. He is grateful for the trust and support given to him through Kiva and Afodenic since many families with limited resources are able to change their quality of life. The loan will be used to buy zinc.

loans.use: buy zinc.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha, a 40 year married woman, has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity, nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past seven years, she has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transporting the products for her business. Martha dreams of expanding the business to supply a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 40,000 loan she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Rama

texts.en:
Rama is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 80,000 to establish another business of motorcycle transportation. With the loan, he wants to purchase a motorcycle. The previous loan helped him build a pub for his palm wine business and he has since received high profits from the business.  

Rama dreams of expanding his business of palm wine sales in the future. The loan has helped him to build a permanent house for his family, hence improving their living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for transport business.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 55 years old and married. He has four children, one of whom works.

Amer has been a store-owner since 2005, where he repairs and sells electric chillers. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well-known in the surrounding areas.

Amer is requesting a $3000 loan in order to renovate and repair his store. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to renovate and repair his store.

loans.name: Nazih

texts.en:
Nazih is a 47-year-old married man, and the father of four children, who is sacrificing his whole life for their happiness and success. Nazih works in selling and fixing used car wheels. He is an expert in his field and is recommended by almost all of his customers. 

He is an Al Majmoua borrower with a very impressive history of paying back, and has shown that he is a man of his word since he made the exact special improvements on his business as the action plan he had before.

Nazih is applying today for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy new car wheels to start selling since his clientele is increasing, and some of his customers are requesting new and not used wheels. He wants to please them, and this loan is the best way to achieve what they want. Nazih hopes to continue improving his business and pleasing his customers.

loans.use: to buy new car wheels with special modifications at good prices.

loans.name: Dogo

texts.en: Dogo is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 50,000 for education purposes. With the loan, he wants to pay school fees for his children who attend school. With the previous loan, he managed to get an additional 50 percent profits and he added on his own savings and purchased a motorcycle. Dogo is giving thanks to Yehu and Kiva lenders for giving him loans to boost his business and improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en:
Amer is from Iraq. He is 38 years old, married and has three children. He has been an owner of a plant for water filtration and purification since 2010. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan in order to purchase water filtration equipment for his plant. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase water filtration equipment for his plant

loans.name: Gnambossou Gbeta Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GNAMBOSSOU GBETA est composé de huit personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Louise Clarisse est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Louise Clarisse est âgée de 45 ans et est mariée à un plombier du nom de Christophe. Louise Clarisse a arrêté l'école au niveau secondaire. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Louise Clarisse vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple se partage les différentes charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux différents besoins de la famille, Louise Clarisse vend depuis vingt ans des tissus "bazins" par le système de distribution. Cette activité lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté à ses besoins. Louise Clarisse s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Louise Clarisse sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GNAMBOSSOU GBETA, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Gnambossou Gbeta group is composed of eight people who live in the same neighbourhood. This is the first time that the group has asked for a loan through ALIDé in order to take their business to the next level.  The representative of the group, Louise Clarisse, is the one in the photo raising her hand.  Louise Clarisse is 45 years old and is married to a plumber named Christophe.  Louise Clarisse stopped attending school at the secondary level.  The couple has two children, both of whom are in school and dependents.

Louise Clarisse livers together with her husband and children.  The couple shares the different household needs.  To support the family, Louise Clarisse has been selling “bazin” fabrics [damask] for twenty years through a distribution system.  This has allowed her to make ends meet without great difficulty.  Louise Clarisse stocks up at a market in Benin.

In the quest to satisfy her clientele and to increase her turnover and profits, Louise Clarisse, along with the other members of the Gnambossou Gbeta group, is asking for her first loan through ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics.

loans.name: Julian Ricardo

texts.es:
Julian es un hombre de 37 años de edad que vive con su pareja y sus 2 pequeños hijos, por los cuales, él  y la madre de sus pequeños dan todo de sí para salir adelante y fortalecerse como familia. Actualmente, esta pequeña familia vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar que está logrando grandes mejoras económicas y cada día le brinda una mejor bienvenida a los nuevos microempresarios.

Julian disfruta mucho leer y aprender siempre un poco más de lo que sabe, para de esa forma resolver las dudas que sus pequeños puedan presentar en el transcurso de su crecimiento. Julian se dedica a soldar, hacer puertas y ventanas de fierro, el labora un aproximado de 10 de horas, y nos comenta que han existido ocasiones en las que ha tenido algunas dificultades en el diseño de sus trabajos pero con el tiempo ha mejorado y progresado en su negocio.

Julian se dedica a este negocio porque tiene buena cantidad de clientes y básicamente labora en esto, porque le permite generar los ingresos necesarios para solventar los gastos que su familia necesita diariamente. Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Julian desea comprar maquinaria, una compresora y una soldadora, lo que lo ayudará a mejorar y facilitarle el trabajo diario que realiza. El desea convertirse en un líder en este tipo de negocio e incrementar el número de sus clientes, desea que ya no sean 4 clientes diarios si no el doble o el triple, lo que hará que sus pequeños se conviertan en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Julian is a 37 year old man who lives with his partner and 2 young children for whom he and the mother of his children give their all to get ahead and be stronger as a family. At present, this small family lives in the city of Ica, a place that is making big economic improvements and each day give a better reception to the new microentrepeneurs.

Julian enjoys reading very much and learns a little bit more that what he currently does because he wants to answer any of his little ones questions that they may have as they continue to grow and learn. Julian is a welder; he makes iron doors and windows and works about 10 hours a day. He says that there have been occassions when he has had some problems designing his work but with time he has improved and progressed in his business.

Julian works in this field because he has a good number of customers and is able to have enough income to meet all of his families’ daily expenses. With the help of Kiva loaners, Julian wishes to buy machinery, a compressor and a soldering-iron, both of which will help him improve and make his work easier. He wishes to be a leader in this type of business and to increase his customers since he doesn’t want 4 daily customers but double or triple that amount since it will help his little children become great professionals.

loans.use: buy machinery, a compressor and a soldering-iron.

loans.name: Jessica Vianey

texts.es:
Jessica casada, comerciante, tiene su taller de costura en su domicilio, siendo su fuente de ingreso económico. Su esposo técnico eléctrico. Sus proyectos mejorar su condiciones de vida mediante la inversión en su negocio ya que comercializa sus prenda de ropa, así también vende zapatos por encargos. Siempre invierte en compra de materia prima para la costura. Planes a futuro expandir su negocio contratando a un ayudante para elaborar mayores cantidades de prenda y a corto tiempo, cumpliendo con los pedidos. 
Con el préstamo comprara materia prima como: telas para traje de baño, tela para toalla, quimonas, tela de sabana, de bermudas, hilos normales, elástico, zipper, alto seda de bordar. Zapatos nuevos. 
Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio y alcanzar sus planes y proyectos para un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Jessica is a married businesswoman.  She has a sewing workshop in her home, and this is her source of income.  Her husband is an electrician.  Jessica plans to improve her living conditions by making an investment in her business.  She sells her garments and she also sells shoes through orders.  She is always investing in the purchase of raw materials for her sewing workshop.  In the future, she plans to expand her business by hiring an assistant to make larger quantities of garments, and to make her garments more quickly so that she can fill her orders.

With this loan, she will buy supplies such as: fabrics to make bathing suits, towels, kimonos, sheets, shorts, regular thread, elastic, zippers, and silk embroidery thread.  She will also buy new shoes.

She thanks the lenders for supporting her in her efforts to develop her business and carry out her plans, so that she can have a better future with her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to invest in her dressmaking workshop

loans.name: Zouheir

texts.en:
Zouheir is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, single and lives with five family members two of whom work.

Zouheir has been the owner of a food market since 2005, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fish, dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $1,200 loan in order to make a showcase, a sliding door, and to add more foodstuffs. His goal is to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his entire family.

loans.use: In order to make a showcase, a sliding door and to add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Lailatu

texts.en: Lailatu is a 40-year-old married woman. She has 7 children and all are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a fisherman. Lailatu operates a business of baking half cakes and selling them at the market. She has worked in this business for 6 years and was previously selling Khangas. Her primary customers are local residents. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense to be school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Lailatu will use the Kes 25,000 loan to buy more cooking equipment, bales of wheat flour, cooking oil, and sugar. Lailatu aspires to open a big shop in the future. She joined Yehu because of flexible affordable policies that favor customers needs.

loans.use: to buy more cooking equipment, bales of wheat flour, cooking oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 45-year-old married man, father of five children. A year ago, Ahmad started a new business that has to do with construction. He sells and transports necessary sand & pebbles requested in such business.
Ahmad used to be a soldier but he retired a year ago, that's why he started this business in order to make new income to cover his family's expenses.
Ahmad applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy extra sand & pebbles necessary for his business.
He is working hard to expand his business and to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy extra sand & pebbles necessary for his business

loans.name: María

texts.es: Doña María es una clienta de 42 años de edad, casada y madre de cuatro hijos. Vive con su esposo y tres hijos, de los cuales solamente uno es menor de edad. Ella tiene trayectoria en la Fundación. Es trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Vive en una finca en donde tiene el ganado y otros animales. Su actividad principal es el ordeño de las vacas para la venta de la leche. Tiene el apoyo de una hija para la actividad y su esposo le ayuda en los tiempos libres de él, debido a que es asalariado. Cuenta con cuatro vacas lecheras y cuatro novillas. Tiene solamente un cliente y es una quesera en la misma comunidad, a los cuales le vende la leche. Su meta es lograr aumentar su inventario de ganado para crecer, superarse y vivir del mismo negocio, hacerlo familiar. Hacer una empresa grande y asi buscar nuevos clientes para sus productos. Uno de los obstáculos que presenta su negocio es la inestabilidad del precio de la leche.
texts.en: Mrs. María is a 42 year old mother to four children and is married. She lives with her husband and three children of which only one is a minor. Mrs. María has been a member of the foundation for a while; she is a hardworker and is dedicated to her family. Her main work is milking the cows to sell the milk, and has the help of a daughter and her husband helps when he has free time since he is working elsewhere. Mrs. María has 4 dairy cows and four heifers; she only has one customer who makes cheese in the same neighborhood. Her goal is to increase her livestock inventory to grow her business, get ahead and live off her business, to make it a family affair. Mrs. María would like to have a big enterprise and new customers for her products; one of the obstacles that her business faces is the changing milk prices.

loans.use: buy a bull and a heifer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To repair his Rickshaw [motor-taxi]

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es:
Mario casado, comerciante de ropas surtidas, zapatos, con el préstamo anterior invirtió en la compra de mercadería para el negocio. Actualmente su proyecto es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y aumentar sus ventas. Tiene su negocio desde hace tiempo siendo la fuente de ingreso económico de su hogar, también es pastor de una iglesia dedicando tiempo para servirle  a Dios. 
Con este ciclo de préstamo comprar mercadería nueva como: blusas, calcetines, camisolines, camisola, toallas, calzones microfibra, bóxer, braseares,  perfumes, trajes para niños entre otros. Sus planes a corto plazo es seguir invirtiendo en el negocio para el bien común de la familia.
Expresando que esta agradecido con la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Mario is married and sells clothing and shoes for a living.  With the previous loan he bought merchandise for the business.  His current project is to carry out home improvements and increase sales.  He has been business for some time, and it is the only source of income for his household.  He is also a church pastor and dedicates time to serving God.

With the new loan he plans to buy merchandise such as blouses, socks, camisoles, undershirts, towels, microfiber underwear, boxer shorts, bras, perfumes, children's clothing, etc.  His short-term plans involve continued investment in his business for his family's common good.  He is very grateful to the financial institution for the support in developing his business.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Wilson Antonio

texts.es: El profesor Wilson trabaja como coordinador de carrera y docente horario de la Universidad URACCAN, solicita  su 6to crédito para pagar un post Grado en educación,  es un hombre muy responsable, honesto, con mucho espíritu de su superacion personal y profesional, su esposa trabaja como ejecutiva de ventas del Gallo mas Gallo, ambos estudian y trabajan, son bien luchadores, le gusta el progreso tanto material, espiritual y profesional, tiene 2 hijas, son una familia bien unida que sueñan que sus hijas crezcan sanas, que estudien para que sean en el futuro personas de bien y tener estabilidad laboral para ayudar a su familia ya que son bien humildes y unidos
texts.en: Professor Wilson works as a career coordinator and hourly instructor at the URACCAN University.  He is requesting his sixth loan to pay for a graduate degree in Education.  He is a responsible, honest man with a heightened sense of personal and professional excellence.  His wife works as a sales executive at "Gallo mas Gallo".  They both work and study hard.  He likes getting ahead materially, spiritually and professionally.  He has two daughters and they are a very united family.  His goal is for his daughters to grow up in a healthy atmosphere and study so they can become good citizens and have stable employment, in order to help their humble, close-knit family.

loans.use: To pay for graduate studies.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es una joven de 30 años la cual vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido en cualquier época del años, asimismo conocida por uno de los atractivos turísticos más importantes del país el cual es la “Laguna de Huacachina”, también por ser una ciudad donde hay mucha agricultura en especial el cultivo de Algodón, uva y esparrago. En su tiempo libre a estela le gusta mucho cantar y sobre todo preparar y comer uno de sus platillos favoritos, el cual es el riquisisisimo “Pollo a la Braza”; ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios debido a los pocos recursos de sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Psicología.

Día a día Estela trabaja con mucho esmero en su negocio de venta de abarrotes en la bodega que tiene en casa, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien ene su negocio porque ofrece una buena atención y tiene precios accesibles para sus clientes.

Estela está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar andamios, mostradores, y abarrotes, lo que le permitirá mostrar mejor sus productos y así mejorar sus ingresos para seguir trabajando día a día y realizar su más grande sueño:” Tener un minimarket”
texts.en:
Estela, 30, is a young woman who lives in the city of Ica, which is known for its warm climate throughout the year.  It is also known for having one of the most attractive tourist spots in the country, the "Laguna de Huacachina", and for being an agricultural city where cotton, grapes and asparagus are grown.  In her free time, Estela loves to sing and make her favorite dishes, such as her tasty "Pollo a la Brasa" (roast chicken).  She was only able to get a secondary education because of her parents' low income, but she would have liked to study psychology.

Every day Estela works hard in the grocery store she runs out of her house.  She spends about 12 hours and attends to up to 40 customers a day.  She believes her business does well because she is attentive and offers low prices.

Estela is very grateful to Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their support she will be ble to buy shelving, display cases and groceries.  This will allow her to display her products better and increase her income so she can continue working daily to meet her greatest goal which is: "To have a minimarket".

loans.use: To buy shelving, display cases and groceries.

loans.name: Samer

texts.en:
Samer is a 29-year-old married man who opened his own restaurant three years ago to improve his living situation.
Samer is a hardworking man with 13 years of experience in his industry. He has been an Al Majmoua borrower for two cycles. His previous loan was used to buy materials needed for his business, such as oils and other raw materials. The loan had a very positive effect on increasing his income.
With the profit he made and the help of his new Youth Loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, Samer will invest in making the necessary repairs to his restaurant and buy new machines.
This is an excellent step forward to please his customers and improve his business.

loans.use: To make necessary repairs to his restaurant, and buy new machines.

loans.name: Abass

texts.en:
Abass is a 22-year-old single man who has been working as a barber since 2003. Two years ago he opened his own barber shop and it was a good step forward for proving for himself and improving his living. 

Abass is planning to start an agricultural business that has to do with olives and olive oil, so he needs to buy olive trees. It is for this reason that he has applied for a youth loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. The loan will provide the necessary capital to start this business.

He hopes to expand both businesses as much as he can to improve both social and financial situations.

loans.use: to start new agricultural business.

loans.name: Juana Elsira

texts.es: Juana Elsira es casada, es dueña de una pulperia y trabaja como docente en la colonia providencia, se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora, honesta, de buenos modales, tiene un niño, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que trabaja en la parcelita que ellos poseen el se dedica a la siembra de Raices y Tubérculos. Juana esta  solicitando su 6to credíto para pagar el curso de titulación para obtener el titulo de Licenciada en Ingles, ya que esta culmminado una de las dos carrera que cursa. Tanto ella como su esposo son muy trabajadores y luchadores, que sueñan con tener un mejores condiciones como toda persona lo sueña y que su linda familia goze de salud y amor a Dios y al projimo.
texts.en:
Juana Elsira is married, owns a grocery store and works as a teacher at the Providencia Colony.  Known as a hard-working, honest, good-mannered lady, she has a son and receives help from her husband who works on a small patch of land they own where they grow roots and tubers.  

Juana is requesting her sixth loan to pay for tuition for her degree in English, since she is finishing one of the two degrees she is studying.
